div.p:
Wavelet coherence between the standardized beech M_index and winter-NAO indices. Wavelet coherence between the standardized beech M_index and winter-NAO indices. Winter-NAO indices used: Climate Prediction Centre-NOAA a, Hurrell
10
b and Jones et al.
64
c. X-axes: years of analysis. Y-axes: frequency domain of the NAO-masting relationship in years. Note that the x- and y-axes vary between plots. Arrows pointing up-right show in-phase behavior and y leading x, i.e., NAO leading M_index. Black contour designates frequencies of significant coherence ( p < 0.1, two-sided test); the white cone of influence shows the data space immune from distortion by edge effects. The white squares show the period of strong coherence between 1960 and 2000
